item.title: How to create a multilevel dropdown menu in React
item.description: Multilevel dropdown menus are a staple of web design. With the ability to provide multiple options to select from, they make navigation bars dynamic and organized.

item.title: Using the new JavaScript .at() method
item.description: The JavaScript .at() method was introduced in the August release of the ECMA International TC39’s relative indexing proposal to allow developers to grab elements based on their indexes
item.content:encoded: The JavaScript .at() method was introduced in the August release of the ECMA International TC39’s relative indexing proposal to allow developers to grab elements based on their indexes

item.title: What is a virtual DOM in React?
